True, the reviewer gets to slaughter the author in print at the end of it all, but this merely appeases the desire for revenge, which only real blood would satisfy.', 'role': 'user'}],
      dtype=object), 'reward_model': {'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '译文完整呈现原文所有句子和信息，未遗漏或删减任何内容。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文忠实传达原文的字面意义，包括阅读进度、页数、痛苦发现、折磨过程、沙漠比喻、缺乏绿洲、书评人角色、批评行为、复仇欲望层次等要点。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文保持原文略带夸张、讽刺和幽默的语气，未转为平铺直叙或过度庄重的文体。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文在中文阅读时自然顺畅，无明显直译痕迹或生硬表达，符合中文读者的语言习惯。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文使用符合口语化、情感强烈的表达（如“烂书”“糟糕透顶”）来还原原文的非正式语气。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文准确翻译“crossing the Sahara Desert”及“no oases”等比喻，保留沙漠和绿洲的意象。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文保留原文的夸张与暴力修辞（如“折磨”“屠杀作者”“血”），未弱化为中性词。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文将“reviewer”译为“书评人”或等价表达，未模糊为普通读者。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文将“slaughter the author in print”译为对作者的严厉文字批评（如“痛批”“批个体无完肤”），未呈现为实际的物理暴力。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文清晰区分“稍微平息复仇欲望”与“只有真血才能满足”两层效果，体现安慰与真正解恨的对比。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文使用恰当的连接词（如“有时”“接下来”“诚然”“但”“而”）保持原文的因果与转折结构。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文的句子结构清晰，合并或拆分后不产生歧义或逻辑断裂。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文将“only real blood would satisfy”解释为夸张的表达（如“解恨”“过瘾”），未字面翻译为鼓励真实流血。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文全段保持统一的文体与语域（口语书面混合），未在严肃、正式、俚语之间切换。', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文仅提供中文翻译本身，不包含注释、分析或其他额外信息。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文将“real dog”比喻性地译为表示糟糕书籍的词汇（如“烂书”），未出现字面动物含义。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文准确呈现“crossing the Sahara Desert”及“no oases”的比喻，保持原文的艰苦阅读意象。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文保留“only real blood would satisfy”的夸张表达，使用如“真正的鲜血”或等价强烈词汇。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文捕捉原文的讽刺、沮丧和戏剧性语调，使用富有表现力的词汇（如“煎熬”“痛苦”“诚然”），避免平淡直译。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文正确翻译数值细节：‘first 20 pages’为‘开头二十页’，‘500-page book’为‘五百页的大部头’或等价表述。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文必须使用“只有真正的鲜血才能平息”这一完整短语，且不可使用“见血了”“只有血”等变体。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文必须出现“在文章里把作者痛批一顿”或等价的“痛批”表述，禁止使用仅含“批”或“批个体无完肤”等替代。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文必须包含“稍稍抚慰了复仇的渴望”或完全等价的表达，且不得出现“稍微平息”“稍稍平息”等非精准替代。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文必须使用“彻头彻尾的烂书”来形容该书，禁止使用“糟糕透顶”“烂透了”等其他形容。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文必须在描述阅读其余部分时出现“穿越撒哈拉沙漠的煎熬”，且不可仅写成“穿越撒哈拉沙漠”。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '译文必须在沙漠比喻后紧跟“只不过途中往往连绿洲都没有”这一完整短语，任何省略“途中”或改写为“只不过往往连一处绿洲都没有”均视为不合格。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}}

prompt: [{'content': "Write a story that falls into the genre of Fantasy, Mystery, Thriller, based on the following prompt:\nProphets and seers don't HAVE to give musings and warnings of the future in vague, riddling, or purposefully misleading ways. They mostly only do that when the people who come to them are being arrogant jerks or when someone knowing their actual happy end will cause that end to not happen.", 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The story clearly includes distinct fantasy, mystery, and thriller elements, each appearing in the plot, setting, or stakes, and none are merely mentioned in passing.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative shows that prophets can give clear, direct predictions, and they choose to be vague only when the client is arrogant or when revealing a happy ending would jeopardize it.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story presents a consistent fantasy setting with defined magic system, politics, culture, or deities, and all details remain internally consistent throughout.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The plot contains an investigative question or hidden cause that is revealed gradually through clues, not disclosed all at once.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative maintains sustained suspense or danger with escalating stakes or time pressure, especially concerning the prophecy’s consequences.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The prophet/seer is portrayed with distinct personality traits, motivations, and an ethical stance on truth versus vagueness, reflected in dialogue and decisions.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least one main client/querent is given specific motives, fears, and flaws, and their attitude toward the prophecy influences the level of clarity they receive.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story dramatizes the trade‑off between giving full truth, using ambiguity, and how knowledge can create or destroy outcomes, aligning with the prompt’s paradox.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The mechanics of future predictions operate consistently (e.g., branching, contingent), and changes in behavior plausibly alter outcomes without causal contradictions.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A person or entity actively works to conceal themselves or manipulate fate, adding mystery/thriller tension, and their presence is evident in the narrative.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The prophet’s choices about what to reveal or conceal produce clear, observable consequences for characters’ safety, happiness, or political outcomes.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story follows a discernible arc (setup, development, resolution) and ends with a thematically satisfying conclusion, not an abrupt cut‑off.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The language is clear; scenes, actions, and dialogue are easy to follow with no ambiguous pronoun references or confusing jumps.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The core ideas about prophecy, arrogance, and fragile happiness are demonstrated through scenes, choices, or dialogue rather than extended exposition.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story maintains a consistent, immersive tone that blends wonder with unease and tension appropriate for a fantasy‑mystery‑thriller.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative includes at least one striking supporting element (e.g., spirit companion, ritual, recurring symbol) that reinforces worldbuilding and theme.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'All dialogue advances plot or reveals character and thematic conflict without filler or on‑the‑nose exposition.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The plot, phrasing, and devices are original and do not copy specific elements from known references, while still echoing the intended themes.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'When a hopeful or happy future is presented, the story shows how revealing it could endanger that outcome, and the seer’s handling of hope matches the prompt.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story provides sufficient length and detail to fully develop setting, characters, and tension comparable to a short story, not a brief outline.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative effectively blends fantasy (magic, seers), mystery (investigation, crime), and thriller (tension, stakes) elements throughout the story.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story explicitly establishes that prophets/seers can give clear predictions and only become vague for arrogant clients or to protect a happy ending.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative articulates the two reasons for riddling prophecies: dealing with arrogant individuals and preventing knowledge of a happy ending from ruining it.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The oracle/seer provides the protagonist with highly specific, actionable details (e.g., names, exact locations, tactical advice) rather than metaphorical riddles.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist is shown to possess traits such as humility, competence, or lack of arrogance that justify receiving direct answers.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story includes an example of a character (villain, past client, or foil) who receives a vague riddle due to arrogance, highlighting the contrast.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist uses the specific information from the seer to successfully avoid a trap, exploit a weakness, or resolve the central conflict.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response is a complete story with a clear beginning, middle, and end, not merely a scene fragment or exposition.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story presents at least one prophecy that is delivered in plain language (no riddles) and includes fully specified, actionable details (exact name, location, time, and method) which the protagonist can act on without any additional inference, and the narrative later confirms the accuracy of each detail.', 'points': 12, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The plot centers on a single, well‑defined investigative case that is solved through a sequence of at least three distinct clues presented to the reader before the final revelation, with each clue logically building on the previous one.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative maintains an explicit, continuously decreasing timer (e.g., minutes or hours) that creates imminent danger, and the protagonist must complete the critical action before the timer reaches zero; the timer is mentioned in at least two separate scenes.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The prophet/seer is given a backstory, a clear personal motivation, and a moral philosophy, all explained through at least two dialogue exchanges, and their decision to be vague or clear is directly linked to those motivations.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story explicitly depicts one character being labeled as arrogant and receiving a vague/riddling prophecy, while a different, non‑arrogant character receives a direct, detailed prophecy; both outcomes are shown and contrasted.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The oracle provides at least three concrete data points (e.g., name, exact address, specific trap mechanism) that are later verified as correct within the narrative.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The mechanics of future prediction are defined by at least two explicit rules (e.g., branching vs. fixed outcomes, butterfly‑effect limitation) and these rules are consistently applied in at least two separate scenes without contradiction.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt:
[{'content': '对以下文章进行摘要，要求中文，限制在30字以内。
现如今，很多口耳相传、约定俗成的所谓“常识”在科学界其实还没有定论。一个简单的议题可以有三派主流观点，每个都论据全面、论证严谨，但结论却大相径庭，引用谁的观点都难言客观。驳倒这个命题很简单：请问，他们是怎么定义强度的？
重量训练不会摧毁我们的身体和神经系统，相反，它会加速循环、愉悦心灵、解除神经疲劳。只要强度控制得当，我们就永远不会过度训练。
高强度的训练只要每周不超过两次就是安全的。这里所说的高强度训练是指，对大肌肉群（腿部和臀部）所施加的增肌训练。这种类型的训练如果太频繁，的确会对身体产生一些负面影响。而上半身的单块肌肉训练对于整个精神和身体的影响远远低于许多人的想象。', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '答案全文使用中文字符，不出现任何非中文文字或外文单词。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要全文（含标点）不超过30个汉字。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要中出现“强度控制”“强度得当”或等价表达，明确指出强度需被控制。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要中提到高强度腿臀训练的频率上限为“每周不超过两次”或等价表述。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要明确指出在适当强度下，重量训练不会损伤身体或神经系统。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要概括重量训练对身体或精神的正面作用，如“有益身心”“愉悦心灵”等。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要区分大肌群（腿部、臀部）训练影响大于上半身单块肌肉训练的影响。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要的核心围绕训练安全性、强度与频率关系，未被与“常识”等旁枝内容主导。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要内容忠实原文，未出现原文未提及的事实、数字或结论。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要语言流畅，句子结构完整，无语法错误或冗余词汇。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要用词客观中性，未使用绝对化、夸张或煽动性词汇。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要全文（含标点）字符数必须不超过30个汉字（按Unicode码点计数），任何超出即判为不合格。', 'points': 12, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要中必须出现完整短语“每周不超过两次”，其他等价表述视为不合格。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要必须明确使用“不会损伤神经与身体”或等价的否定表述，直接说明在适当强度下重量训练不致损伤。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要需明确提及“腿部和臀部”或“腿臀”训练的影响，并对比上半身单块肌肉训练的影响，缺失任一要素即不合格。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要必须出现完整短语“强度控制得当”或“强度需被控制”，其他变体不计。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}
extra_info:
{'prompt': array([{'content': '对以下文章进行摘要，要求中文，限制在30字以内。\n现如今，很多口耳相传、约定俗成的所谓“常识”在科学界其实还没有定论。一个简单的议题可以有三派主流观点，每个都论据全面、论证严谨，但结论却大相径庭，引用谁的观点都难言客观。驳倒这个命题很简单：请问，他们是怎么定义强度的？\n重量训练不会摧毁我们的身体和神经系统，相反，它会加速循环、愉悦心灵、解除神经疲劳。只要强度控制得当，我们就永远不会过度训练。\n高强度的训练只要每周不超过两次就是安全的。这里所说的高强度训练是指，对大肌肉群（腿部和臀部）所施加的增肌训练。这种类型的训练如果太频繁，的确会对身体产生一些负面影响。而上半身的单块肌肉训练对于整个精神和身体的影响远远低于许多人的想象。', 'role': 'user'}],
      dtype=object), 'reward_model': {'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '答案全文使用中文字符，不出现任何非中文文字或外文单词。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要全文（含标点）不超过30个汉字。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要中出现“强度控制”“强度得当”或等价表达，明确指出强度需被控制。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要中提到高强度腿臀训练的频率上限为“每周不超过两次”或等价表述。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要明确指出在适当强度下，重量训练不会损伤身体或神经系统。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要概括重量训练对身体或精神的正面作用，如“有益身心”“愉悦心灵”等。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要区分大肌群（腿部、臀部）训练影响大于上半身单块肌肉训练的影响。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要的核心围绕训练安全性、强度与频率关系，未被与“常识”等旁枝内容主导。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要内容忠实原文，未出现原文未提及的事实、数字或结论。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要语言流畅，句子结构完整，无语法错误或冗余词汇。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要用词客观中性，未使用绝对化、夸张或煽动性词汇。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要全文（含标点）字符数必须不超过30个汉字（按Unicode码点计数），任何超出即判为不合格。', 'points': 12, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要中必须出现完整短语“每周不超过两次”，其他等价表述视为不合格。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要必须明确使用“不会损伤神经与身体”或等价的否定表述，直接说明在适当强度下重量训练不致损伤。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '摘要需明确提及“腿部和臀部”或“腿臀”训练的影响，并对比上半身单块肌肉训练的影响，缺失任一要素即不合格。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt:
[{'content': 'For a chemical kinetics experiment on the rate of reaction between sodium thiosulfate and hydrochloric acid, write an approximately 1000-word results and discussion section. Your discussion should include:

1. A comprehensive analysis of the discrepancies between your experimental rate constant values and literature values, considering three key aspects: theoretical assumptions, experimental methodology, and data processing techniques.

2. For each identified source of error, develop detailed recommendations for experimental improvements, including equipment modifications, procedural refinements, and alternative analytical approaches.

3. Write using appropriate scientific language and terminology for a chemistry journal, while maintaining clarity and accessibility for undergraduate readers.

4. Incorporate relevant insights from your laboratory experience as a chemistry student, reflecting on practical challenges encountered during the experiment.

5. Include at least two visual representations (graphs or tables) that effectively illustrate your data analysis and support your discussion points.

Original experimental data, laboratory protocols, and literature references can be found in: **Resource Materials**

2.3 Reaction Rate Measurement
    Reaction conducted in temperature-controlled water bath at 25°C
    Initial concentrations: Na₂S₂O₃ (0.1M), HCl (0.2M)
    Measurement method: Turbidity formation using spectrophotometer at 420nm
    Results:
    Experimental rate constant (k): 0.0215 M⁻¹s⁻¹
    Literature rate constant at 25°C: 0.0298 M⁻¹s⁻¹

Laboratory Safety and Procedural Guidelines:
1. Review the experiment protocol before entering the laboratory and prepare data collection sheets.
2. Verify all glassware and equipment are clean and in working order before beginning.
3. Prepare solutions with precision, using analytical grade reagents and proper dilution techniques.
4. Maintain constant temperature conditions throughout the experiment using water bath.
5. Record time measurements precisely using digital stopwatch.
6. Clean all equipment thoroughly after use and dispose of waste solutions according to safety protocols.

Selected References:
1. Atkins, P.W., "Physical Chemistry," Oxford University Press, 2018.
2. Chang, R., "Physical Chemistry for the Chemical Sciences," University Science Books, 2014.
3. Laidler, K.J., "Chemical Kinetics," Harper & Row, 1987.
4. Espenson, J.H., "Chemical Kinetics and Reaction Mechanisms," McGraw-Hill, 1995.
5. Connors, K.A., "Chemical Kinetics: The Study of Reaction Rates in Solution," VCH Publishers, 1990.', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The Results section includes a self‑contained summary of experimental conditions, measurement method, experimental rate constant (k_exp), literature rate constant (k_lit), absolute difference, and percent difference.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The Discussion is organized into clearly labeled subsections or paragraph groups covering theory, methodology, data processing, and personal reflections.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The combined Results and Discussion text contains between 800 and 1200 words (approximately 1000 words).', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript explicitly states k_exp = 0.0215\u202fM⁻¹\u202fs⁻¹ and k_lit = 0.0298\u202fM⁻¹\u202fs⁻¹, calculates the absolute and percent deviation, and indicates that the experimental value is lower than the literature value.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The discussion analyzes at least three theoretical assumptions (rate‑law form, mechanism simplifications, ionic‑strength/activities, temperature constancy) as possible contributors to the k discrepancy.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text mentions that the Na₂S₂O₃\u202f+\u202fHCl reaction proceeds via multiple steps, describes relevant intermediates, and explains limitations of treating it as a simple second‑order or pseudo‑first‑order process.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript acknowledges the ionic strength of the 0.1\u202fM\u202fNa₂S₂O₃ / 0.2\u202fM\u202fHCl solution, states that activity coefficients deviate from unity, and explains how ignoring activities can bias the apparent rate constant.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The discussion quantifies realistic temperature control limits (e.g., ±0.5\u202f°C), applies Arrhenius reasoning, and links possible temperature deviations to the observed k error.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Specific theoretical improvements are proposed (e.g., add supporting electrolyte, apply activity corrections, record temperature continuously, perform Arrhenius corrections).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript critically evaluates practical execution aspects (mixing, timing, transfer, temperature maintenance, spectrophotometric measurement, scattering, cuvette handling) as sources of error in k.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text explicitly describes the mixing/transfer dead time, provides an approximate magnitude, and explains its effect on the time origin and initial‑rate underestimation.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The discussion explains that colloidal sulfur causes light scattering, violates Beer–Lambert linearity, and notes practical issues such as alignment, bubbles, and noisy low‑absorbance data.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Concrete equipment or procedural refinements are recommended (e.g., improved mixing strategy, reduced dead time, thermostatted cell holder, spectrophotometer calibration, matched cuvettes).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least one higher‑level instrument (e.g., stopped‑flow apparatus, in‑situ optical probe, turbidimetric mode) is mentioned, with a note on its feasibility for an undergraduate lab.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript critiques data‑treatment steps (initial‑rate determination, time resolution, fitting model choice, pseudo‑first‑order assumption, calibration) and links them to underestimation of k.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The method for obtaining initial rates (e.g., early‑time points, linear fit of ΔA/Δt) is described, and limitations due to data density and timing precision are explained.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Limitations of applying a pseudo‑first‑order model to the HCl excess are identified, and the impact of including later‑time data in the fit is discussed.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The conversion from absorbance to concentration is addressed, noting whether a calibration curve was used and how its quality may introduce systematic error.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Specific analytical improvements are proposed (e.g., denser early‑time sampling, kinetic acquisition mode, restriction to true initial region, non‑linear regression, refined calibration curves).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least two visual elements (tables and/or graphs) are included, each explicitly referenced in the text and relevant to kinetic analysis and k comparison.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A table summarizing key kinetic parameters (experimental k, literature k, absolute and percent differences, experimental conditions) is presented with a clear label and headings.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A figure (e.g., absorbance vs. time or fitted kinetic plot) is included, axes are labeled, and the text describes its features and how it supports the discussion.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript uses appropriate chemical and kinetic terminology, maintains a formal journal‑style tone, and avoids slang or unnecessary jargon.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Advanced concepts (activities, Arrhenius behavior, pseudo‑first‑order kinetics) are explained with brief definitions or context so that an undergraduate reader can understand.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Relevant literature is cited to provide context for the mechanism and prior kinetic findings, beyond merely quoting the literature rate constant.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'First‑person reflections on practical challenges (e.g., timing distractions, shared water bath, equipment limitations) are incorporated and linked to specific data issues.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The observed ~30\u202f% deviation in k is explicitly connected to the cumulative effects of the discussed theoretical, experimental, and analytical error sources.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The conclusion acknowledges that, despite discrepancies, the experiment captured the core kinetic behavior (e.g., correct reaction order, reasonable magnitude of k).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'All numerical values, experimental conditions, assumptions, and conclusions are internally consistent with no contradictions.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text accurately cites k_exp = 0.0215\u202fM⁻¹\u202fs⁻¹ and k_lit = 0.0298\u202fM⁻¹\u202fs⁻¹ and calculates the relative error (≈28\u202f%).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least two distinct visual aids (e.g., a comparison table and a reaction‑profile graph) are provided and referenced in the discussion.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript analyzes the assumption that turbidity directly reflects concentration, discusses the induction period/nucleation lag, and explains how this can make the measured rate appear slower.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The discussion identifies temperature fluctuations caused by transferring the cuvette from the water bath to a non‑thermostatted spectrophotometer as a critical source of error.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text critiques applying the Beer‑Lambert law to light‑scattering turbidity data and addresses issues with linearity and defining the reaction start time (t\u202f=\u202f0).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Specific hardware upgrades are recommended, such as a thermostatted cuvette holder to maintain 25\u202f°C during spectrophotometric measurement.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Procedural changes to minimize dead time (e.g., in‑situ magnetic stirring or stopped‑flow mixing) are suggested.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'An alternative method (e.g., iodometric titration) is proposed to measure reactant concentration directly and avoid turbidity‑related issues.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'First‑person insights regarding practical laboratory challenges (e.g., handling time, mixing speed) are explicitly incorporated as requested.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Appropriate terminology (e.g., Arrhenius equation, stoichiometry, colloidal, nucleation) is used while maintaining clarity for an undergraduate audience.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The balanced chemical equation for Na₂S₂O₃\u202f+\u202fHCl → products is presented to contextualize the stoichiometry of the reaction.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Proposes at least one distinct analytical technique other than turbidity (e.g., iodometric titration, stopped‑flow spectroscopy) with a brief justification of how it overcomes the limitations of the primary method.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Cites a minimum of two peer‑reviewed journal articles (not textbooks) that report kinetic rate constants for the Na₂S₂O₃\u202f+\u202fHCl reaction under comparable conditions, and discusses how their experimental details relate to the present study.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

       {'criterion': 'The discussion explains that colloidal sulfur causes light scattering, violates Beer–Lambert linearity, and notes practical issues such as alignment, bubbles, and noisy low‑absorbance data.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Concrete equipment or procedural refinements are recommended (e.g., improved mixing strategy, reduced dead time, thermostatted cell holder, spectrophotometer calibration, matched cuvettes).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least one higher‑level instrument (e.g., stopped‑flow apparatus, in‑situ optical probe, turbidimetric mode) is mentioned, with a note on its feasibility for an undergraduate lab.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript critiques data‑treatment steps (initial‑rate determination, time resolution, fitting model choice, pseudo‑first‑order assumption, calibration) and links them to underestimation of k.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The method for obtaining initial rates (e.g., early‑time points, linear fit of ΔA/Δt) is described, and limitations due to data density and timing precision are explained.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Limitations of applying a pseudo‑first‑order model to the HCl excess are identified, and the impact of including later‑time data in the fit is discussed.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The conversion from absorbance to concentration is addressed, noting whether a calibration curve was used and how its quality may introduce systematic error.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Specific analytical improvements are proposed (e.g., denser early‑time sampling, kinetic acquisition mode, restriction to true initial region, non‑linear regression, refined calibration curves).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least two visual elements (tables and/or graphs) are included, each explicitly referenced in the text and relevant to kinetic analysis and k comparison.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'The manuscript uses appropriate chemical and kinetic terminology, maintains a formal journal‑style tone, and avoids slang or unnecessary jargon.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'Relevant literature is cited to provide context for the mechanism and prior kinetic findings, beyond merely quoting the literature rate constant.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'The observed ~30\u202f% deviation in k is explicitly connected to the cumulative effects of the discussed theoretical, experimental, and analytical error sources.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'The text accurately cites k_exp = 0.0215\u202fM⁻¹\u202fs⁻¹ and k_lit = 0.0298\u202fM⁻¹\u202fs⁻¹ and calculates the relative error (≈28\u202f%).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt: [{'content': "Write a story that falls into the genre of Fantasy, Paranormal, based on the following prompt:\nYou are a 'Life force' magic practitioner. You gain magical power by magically pulling the LF from other living things. Usually your kind is feared, but you are well liked. You take the the LF from invasive plants and insects. No one realises how powerful you are until another LFMP arrives.", 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The narrative is set in a secondary world or a subtly altered real world where magic or supernatural life‑force elements are central to the plot, unmistakably placing the story within the fantasy or paranormal genre.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist is explicitly presented as a Life Force Magic Practitioner who gains magical power by pulling life force from living things, and the story provides a coherent internal logic explaining how this process works.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist obtains life force solely from invasive plants, insects, or other pest species, and the narrative clearly shows that benign people, animals, or native life are not harmed.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story establishes that practitioners of life‑force magic are generally feared or distrusted, while the specific protagonist is portrayed as well‑liked and trusted by the local community.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'It is demonstrated that the protagonist possesses a significantly higher level of magical power than others realize, and this fact remains concealed from the community until a later event.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative introduces original terminology, institutions, laws, or historical details specific to life‑force magic that are not generic fantasy tropes.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'When life force is perceived, pulled, or redistributed, the story uses vivid sensory language (e.g., sounds, colors, textures, emotional impressions) to describe the experience.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story is narrated in a consistent first‑person or close third‑person perspective that provides direct access to the protagonist’s thoughts, fears, and perceptions of life force.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist is shown wrestling with moral implications of using life‑force magic, including self‑imposed restraints or fear of becoming a monster.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least one recurring local character or group benefits from the protagonist’s actions, and their reaction is depicted when the protagonist’s true nature or external scrutiny emerges.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'An external force—such as authorities, rival practitioners, or organizations—applies pressure or threat related to life‑force magic, challenging the protagonist’s status quo.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Key scenes use dialogue to reveal worldbuilding details, character dynamics, or stakes, especially in interactions between the protagonist, villagers, and the other LFMP.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story follows a complete short‑story structure: establishing setting, introducing the second practitioner, escalating tension, and reaching a clear turning point or resolution.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Explanations of magic, history, or world details are integrated naturally through action, memory, or dialogue rather than isolated info‑dumps.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative clearly states what is at stake if the protagonist’s power is controlled, exploited, or opposed, and shows plausible consequences for the community or wider world.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The overall tone is eerie, contemplative, or tense, fitting a paranormal fantasy, without reliance on comedy or purely lighthearted elements.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist makes meaningful choices in responding to the new LFMP and any institutional demands, rather than remaining passive.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story concludes with the immediate conflict resolved while hinting at larger future implications of the protagonist’s power.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response is written as a narrative story that fits within the fantasy or paranormal genre.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist explicitly gains magical power by draining life force from invasive plants, weeds, or insects.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist is portrayed as well‑liked by locals and actively helps them (e.g., with farming or gardening), despite the stigma attached to their magic.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative explains why the protagonist is powerful by citing the large biomass or volume of invasive pests compared to individual larger targets.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story contrasts the protagonist’s precise, benevolent use of life‑force magic with the antagonist’s traditional, harmful, or arrogant approach.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'After the confrontation, the community visibly realizes and acknowledges the protagonist’s true power level.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A second Life Force Magic Practitioner arrives from outside, and the narrative presents a clear interaction or conflict between them and the protagonist.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A concrete scene shows the protagonist’s true, overwhelming power being exposed in direct response to the threat posed by the arriving practitioner.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story includes a single, explicit combat scene in which the protagonist’s hidden magical power is dramatically manifested, visibly altering the environment (e.g., shattering terrain, creating a vortex) and the opposing practitioner verbally acknowledges the sudden increase in power.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative provides a concrete numeric estimate of life‑force harvested (e.g., “equivalent to 12 human souls” or “stored 4.3\u202f×\u202f10⁶ joules of vitality”) and explains how that amount is retained or transferred.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least two unique terms invented for the LF‑MP culture (e.g., “Siphon‑Weave”, “Thael‑Latch”) are introduced and explicitly defined in‑story through dialogue or internal monologue.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist explicitly states a personal rule forbidding the extraction of life‑force from sentient beings, demonstrates a moment where that rule is tested, and shows a clear internal decision to refuse the extraction.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Following the power revelation, at least two distinct community members (e.g., a blacksmith and a healer) take coordinated, collective action—such as organizing a defense, performing a ritual, or publicly acknowledging the protagonist’s role.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A rival Life‑Force Magic Practitioner appears whose philosophy is the direct opposite (e.g., mass‑draining humans for conquest) and engages the protagonist in a magical duel that highlights contrasting methodologies.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'When life‑force is pulled, the description must involve at least three sensory modalities (e.g., a specific sound, a color hue, a tactile texture, and an emotional impression) in a single passage.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story contains a clearly marked turning point sentence (e.g., “When the stranger arrived…”) that shifts the narrative direction, followed by a resolution that ties back to the initial premise within the same short‑story length.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt:
[{'content': "Based on the restaurant manager's daily log of:

1. Customer Service
   Front of House: We served 78 customers today. The team handled a large party of 12 very well, despite being short-staffed. I noticed Mai skillfully turning a potential complaint about wait times into a positive experience by offering complimentary appetizers.
   Delivery Orders: Completed 23 delivery orders with only one minor issue when Driver Zhang delivered to the wrong apartment, but quickly corrected his mistake and the customer was understanding.

2. Kitchen Operations
   Food Preparation: Chef Liu prepared all menu items efficiently, though we almost ran out of the daily special by 7pm. The new sous chef showed improvement with plating techniques but still needs guidance on timing.
   Inventory: Noticed we're running low on rice and vegetable oil. I've already placed an order that will arrive tomorrow morning. We had to substitute bell peppers with zucchini for one dish when supplies ran out.

3. Staff Performance
   Punctuality: All staff arrived on time except for Server Wong who was 10 minutes late due to bus delays but called ahead to inform us.
   Teamwork: The kitchen and service staff coordinated well during the dinner rush. I was particularly impressed when the dishwasher stepped in to help prep vegetables when we fell behind.

4. Issues and Solutions
   1. The air conditioning unit was making strange noises during lunch service, which bothered some customers. I called maintenance who fixed it by 5pm before dinner service.
   2. A customer reported finding a hair in their soup. We immediately replaced the dish, offered a complimentary dessert, and Chef Liu reinforced proper hairnet protocol with all kitchen staff.

5. Self-Evaluation
   Today's operations ran relatively smoothly despite being busier than expected. Our team adapted well to challenges, but I need to improve our inventory tracking system to avoid running out of ingredients. The new staff training is progressing, but I should allocate more time for mentoring. Customer feedback was generally positive, with particular praise for our new seasonal menu items. I believe we can improve our table turnover time without rushing customers. Tomorrow I'll focus on streamlining our kitchen-to-table coordination during peak hours.

Write constructive feedback for the restaurant manager, acknowledging strengths while providing guidance for improvement. Your comments should consider the manager's demonstrated leadership style and potential for growth, being both specific and encouraging.", 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The response explicitly addresses the manager’s request for constructive feedback, without rewriting the log or providing unrelated advice.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The feedback uses respectful, supportive language that acknowledges achievements while offering improvement suggestions, never using harsh or blaming phrasing.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response identifies at least two distinct strengths demonstrated in the log (e.g., customer focus, staff recognition, calm problem solving).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Each strength or improvement point is tied to a concrete example from the log (e.g., Mai’s service recovery, hair‑in‑soup incident).', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

The team handled a large party of 12 very well, despite being short-staffed. I noticed Mai skillfully turning a potential complaint about wait times into a positive experience by offering complimentary appetizers.\n   Delivery Orders: Completed 23 delivery orders with only one minor issue when Driver Zhang delivered to the wrong apartment, but quickly corrected his mistake and the customer was understanding.\n\n2. Kitchen Operations\n   Food Preparation: Chef Liu prepared all menu items efficiently, though we almost ran out of the daily special by 7pm. The new sous chef showed improvement with plating techniques but still needs guidance on timing.\n   Inventory: Noticed we're running low on rice and vegetable oil. I've already placed an order that will arrive tomorrow morning. We had to substitute bell peppers with zucchini for one dish when supplies ran out.\n\n3. Staff Performance\n   Punctuality: All staff arrived on time except for Server Wong who was 10 minutes late due to bus delays but called ahead to inform us.\n   Teamwork: The kitchen and service staff coordinated well during the dinner rush. I was particularly impressed when the dishwasher stepped in to help prep vegetables when we fell behind.\n\n4. Issues and Solutions\n   1. The air conditioning unit was making strange noises during lunch service, which bothered some customers. I called maintenance who fixed it by 5pm before dinner service.\n   2. A customer reported finding a hair in their soup. We immediately replaced the dish, offered a complimentary dessert, and Chef Liu reinforced proper hairnet protocol with all kitchen staff.\n\n5. Self-Evaluation\n   Today's operations ran relatively smoothly despite being busier than expected. Our team adapted well to challenges, but I need to improve our inventory tracking system to avoid running out of ingredients. The new staff training is progressing, but I should allocate more time for mentoring. Customer feedback was generally positive, with particular praise for our new seasonal menu items. I believe we can improve our table turnover time without rushing customers. Tomorrow I'll focus on streamlining our kitchen-to-table coordination during peak hours.\n\nWrite constructive feedback for the restaurant manager, acknowledging strengths while providing guidance for improvement. prompt: [{'content': '请写一个科幻小说大纲，一个科学家研发出了能够穿越时空的道具，却意外抵达一个未知的星球，遭遇了一系列危险；与此同时，他的家人也在竭尽全力寻找拯救他的办法。', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'Outline clearly labels the work as science‑fiction, includes a future or high‑technology setting, and avoids purely fantasy or mythic elements.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline provides a detailed description of the scientist’s time‑space device, including its scientific principle, functional limits, and how it enables traversal.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline states that the protagonist unintentionally arrives at a planet unknown to humanity, specifying that it differs from Earth or any known celestial body.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline enumerates at least three distinct environmental hazards, physical laws, or ecological threats on the unknown planet.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline introduces an intelligent alien species or a high‑dimensional system on the planet, describing its unique form and motivations without resorting to generic monsters.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline gives the scientist a specific age, academic discipline, personality traits, and a motivation directly linked to the development of the time‑space technology.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline identifies at least two immediate family members (e.g., spouse, child), providing their occupations, skills, and personality traits relevant to the rescue plot.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline separates the narrative into two parallel threads—survival on the alien world and rescue efforts on Earth—and indicates where they alternate.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline details concrete technical methods, investigative steps, and action plans the Earth‑based team uses to locate and retrieve the scientist.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline specifies a quantifiable risk (e.g., temporal instability) and includes a clear countdown or escalating deadline affecting the plot.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline presents at least one explicit ethical dilemma or institutional conflict arising from the use of the time‑space technology.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline depicts a decisive moment where family members must choose between personal sacrifice and mission success, creating measurable emotional tension.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline is organized into labeled sections or acts (e.g., Act\u202f1, Act\u202f2, Act\u202f3) covering background, inciting incident, development, climax, and resolution.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline shows a logical progression of events with at least three escalating plot points leading to a defined climax and subsequent turning point.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline provides a definitive ending (return, sacrifice, or open‑ended) and includes at least one foreshadowed element for future story development.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline uses consistent scientific terminology and logical constraints so that the described technology and phenomena are internally self‑consistent.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline explicitly states one or two central themes (e.g., technology vs. ethics, individual vs. civilization) and ties them to plot events.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline is written in clear, fluent Chinese with logical ordering that allows direct expansion into chapters without major rewrites.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline contains detailed information for background, characters, key settings, and major plot nodes rather than a brief three‑sentence summary.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline does not copy any proprietary names, passages, or sentences from existing works; it is original in structure and content.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline includes a title, brief synopsis, main character list, world‑building summary, chapter‑by‑chapter plot outline, and identified core theme.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline clearly depicts that the scientist’s time‑space device malfunctions, causing an unintended arrival on an unknown planet rather than a planned destination.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline describes at least two specific survival threats the scientist faces on the alien world (e.g., hostile environment, alien predators, anomalous physics).', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline details the family’s concrete steps on Earth to locate and rescue the scientist, showing their coordinated effort.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline alternates between the alien‑world survival thread and the Earth‑based rescue thread, and indicates a convergence point at the story’s climax.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline provides each primary character with a clear internal motivation and background that drives their actions within the plot.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline defines the scientific principles behind the time‑space device and the unique physical or ecological characteristics of the alien planet.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline introduces at least one antagonistic force (e.g., governmental opposition, time limit, alien entity) that creates external conflict.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline designs a climactic rescue sequence followed by a coherent ending (tragic, hopeful, or open) that resolves the main plot threads.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Outline extracts a deeper philosophical or moral message (e.g., about family, scientific responsibility, acceptance of loss) beyond the surface plot.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须给出一个具体的、可量化的倒计时数值（如“72小时内氧气耗尽”），并在情节中明确将该倒计时作为推动紧张感的核心机制出现。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须列出至少三种不同类别的环境危害（如“重力异常、时间湍流、硅基掠食者”），并对每种危害提供明确的物理或生物学解释。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须详细描述时空装置的工作原理、能量来源、稳定性限制以及导致故障的具体触发条件（例如“微型黑洞产生的时空曲率不稳定”）。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须呈现一种非传统的外星智能形式（如“高维分布式意识”或“时间能量摄取的硅基生物”），并说明其动机与人类冲突的具体逻辑。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须在章节标题或段落标记中清晰标示两条平行叙事线（“异星求生线” 与 “地球救援线”），并指出每次交替的具体章节号。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须列出至少两项具体的技术手段或实验步骤（如“量子接收器重建”“跨维度信号调制”），并说明每项手段的预期成功率或风险。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须呈现至少一种明确的伦理争议（如“政府军事化时空技术”），并在情节中展示相关决策机构的具体立场与争论过程。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须使用明确的章节编号或幕划分（如“第一幕：裂变”），并在每一章节标题下列出至少两项关键情节点。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须说明穿越失败的直接技术原因（如“参数异常导致空间折叠失控”），并展示主角因该原因被迫降落在未知星球的具体过程。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '大纲必须描写家庭成员在地球上采取的具体行动步骤（如“破解量子信号”“搭建跨维度通讯桥”），并提供每一步的时间限制或资源需求。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

       {'criterion': 'Outline uses consistent scientific terminology and logical constraints so that the described technology and phenomena are internally self‑consistent.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'Outline is written in clear, fluent Chinese with logical ordering that allows direct expansion into chapters without major rewrites.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt:
[{'content': '你是一名歌手或歌曲创作者，负责创作歌词。
歌曲主题：歌曲的主题，“公益慢车湘西情”。
歌词:

武陵山如画，锦江水似诗。
公益慢火车，振兴之路正当时。
春梅好服务，潇湘儿女展英姿。
巾帼风采情满怀，共谱人间幸福祉。
江山美，女儿娇。
春风送暖意，千树梅花香飘飘。
苗寨迎客情，三杯米酒乐逍遥。
开好湘西慢火车，架起民族连心桥。
歌曲风格:激情高亢，通俗流行
要求：
1. 根据选定的主题创作歌词。
2. 保持歌曲的风格，运用适合的语言和修辞。
3. 使歌词富有情感，与旋律和节奏协调。', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '歌词必须围绕‘公益慢车湘西情’主题，突出公益慢火车、湘西地域、人文情感和乡村振兴等核心意象，且不出现与主题无关的内容。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词需在自然展开的情况下，至少包含‘武陵山如画’、‘锦江水似诗’、‘公益慢火车’、‘春梅好服务’、‘湘西慢火车’等关键短句或意象，且不只是机械重复。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词应分为至少三段（如主歌、过渡、副歌），每段行数与结构层次符合流行歌曲常规布局，且不出现仅一段的草稿形式。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词用词口语化、易懂，避免使用生僻字或文言表达，符合大众流行歌曲的语言风格。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词整体情绪应表现为昂扬、振奋，在至少一段出现情感高潮或爆发式表达。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词能够传达对湘西、人民及公益慢车的真实情感，句子表达自然流畅，不出现空洞口号。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '每行字数与句式长度保持相对均衡，能够配合常规4/4拍旋律流畅演唱，且至少包含可重复的副歌句式。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词使用比喻、拟人、排比等修辞手法，形成鲜明的视觉画面，且每处修辞均能在文字上清晰辨认。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词中出现苗寨、米酒、银饰、山川等湘西民族与自然元素，且这些元素与主题关联明确。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词明确阐述公益慢车服务大山、连接城乡、助力乡村振兴及改善民生的具体意义。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词塑造‘春梅’、‘巾帼风采’、‘潇湘儿女’等具体人物形象，且描述体现女性力量与服务精神。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词点出或延展‘民族连心桥’的象征，体现不同民族或城乡之间的联结与团结。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词内容积极向上，无任何歧视、暴力、低俗或消极颓废的表述，符合公益正面价值导向。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词用词连贯、语法正确，无明显病句或拗口堆砌，朗读时流畅自然。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词在至少每两行形成押韵或音节呼应，且押韵不影响语义通顺。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词在副歌或关键段落重复出现‘公益慢车’、‘湘西情’等关键词，形成易记的记忆点。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词包含车次往返、岁月记录、孩子眼神等时间或未来希望的意象，且与主题关联。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词以中文逐行呈现，无解释性文字或多余说明，排版清晰，每行结束以换行符。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词内容必须完整体现‘公益慢车湘西情’主题，包括乡村振兴、民族团结、公益服务及湘西风情。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词完整且自然地融入题目提供的核心诗句（如‘武陵山如画’、‘春梅好服务’、‘架起民族连心桥’），且不遗漏任何关键意象。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词采用标准流行歌曲结构（如Verse、Pre‑Chorus、Chorus、Bridge），段落划分明确且顺序合理。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词整体符合‘激情高亢、通俗流行’的风格要求，副歌部分具有明显的情感爆发与感染力。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词押韵自然（如使用统一的‘a’韵或‘ao’韵），并运用比喻、排比等修辞手法提升画面感与节奏感。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '在原有素材基础上，歌词加入合理细节（如票价、背篓等），使叙事更丰满、情感更具象。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词中包含对旋律走向、乐器编排或演唱情绪的标注（如[前奏]、[间奏]、[升调]），以辅助表现音乐性。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '作品结尾附有简要创作说明，解释结构安排、修辞使用及如何契合风格要求。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词必须包含且按顺序出现四个明确标记的段落：`[主歌]`、`[预副歌]`、`[副歌]`、`[桥段]`（或等价的中文标签），每个标签单独占一行，且标签内容不为空。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词末尾必须出现独立的“创作说明”段落，段落标题为“创作说明：”，并在该段落中列出至少三条要点，分别说明（1）结构安排、（2）使用的修辞手法、（3）如何契合“激情高亢、通俗流行”风格。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须原样出现以下全部短句，且每个短句单独成行：`武陵山如画`、`锦江水似诗`、`公益慢火车`、`春梅好服务`、`湘西慢火车`（或等价的“开好湘西慢火车”），不允许在同一行中混入其他文字。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词中至少出现三种不同的音乐指示标签，如`[前奏]`、`[间奏]`、`[升调]`、`[尾奏]`，每个标签必须单独占一行并位于相应段落之前。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须在副歌和结尾（尾奏或收尾句）中各出现一次完全相同的关键词短句“公益慢车湘西情”，且两次出现的文字完全一致。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '歌词中必须出现至少一个具体的公益细节数字描述，如“票价两块钱”“每天运送200名乘客”等，且该数字信息必须以完整句式出现。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '每行歌词的字符数（不含标点）不得超过12个汉字，所有行均满足此限制，以保证可唱性。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

[{'content': '[转载]书画常用知识
原文地址:书画常用知识作者:泪鱼儿书画常用知识 1.条幅:以长宣纸全开及对开(半截或半折),直书之作品为条幅。 2.楹联:两张对开条幅,分别书写上下联语者,亦称对联、对子或楹帖。 3.中堂:将料纸全开或比全开稍小而单独或并挂于楹联间之条幅。 4.斗方:将宣纸裁成八开左右大小(约1尺见方) 之体裁,称之。 5.匾额:又称横披,条幅横书装框或刻于木板悬挂于壁上。 6.条屏:以中堂、条幅等尺幅相类之料纸,写成一组作品,依诗文长短。 7.扇面:尺寸如扇形,有纨扇与折扇,亦可装裱或轴成册。 8.册页:将小幅作品装裱以便翻阅,合之成册,展开成册故名册页,其内容或相互连贯, 或单独成立。 9.手卷:亦成横轴,不便悬挂,只适合在书桌上舒展,观后卷置之横幅作品。 书法作品格式详解 ⒈斗方 中国书画的一种式样。呈正方形。通常用四尺宣纸对裁两份,二尺高二尺宽,也可把四尺宣纸裁为八份,称为"小品斗方",或"斗方小品"。斗方是竖行书写的正方形的作品。书写内容一般是四行至六行。因为行列多,篇章布局时应十分强调上下左右的大小、开合、呼应及节奏变化等。在创作时,要注意正文与落款的主次关系,款字一般小于正文,要自然生动。落款可写在末行正文的下方,布局时应留出余地。款的底端一般不以正文平齐,以避免形式的死板。也可在正文后面另占一行或两行,上下均不能与正文平齐。印章要小于款字,需离开一字以上位置。 ⒉三开 中国书画的一种式样。呈长方形,尺寸不等。如用四尺宣纸分三份裁开,称四尺三开。若用五尺宣纸分三份裁开,称五尺三开。以此类推,同是三开,尺寸大小不同,四尺三开一般为三尺画面(实际是二尺七寸,八平方市尺的三分之一)。五尺三开则是十二平方尺的三分之一,每开画面的面积为四尺。 ⒊对幅 中国书画装裱的一种式样。通常两幅成对悬挂。如书法对幅,称"字对"或 "对联"。明清绘画有"画对",是两幅大小相等的屏条,成对悬挂。也有厅堂正中挂中堂立轴画,两边分挂"字对",或中间悬挂中常立轴书法,两侧悬挂"画对"。 ⒋中堂 中堂是竖行书写的长方形的作品。尺寸一般为一张整宣纸(分四尺、五尺、六尺、八尺等,其中小中堂为68cm×45cm)。因为尺幅比较大,所以需要创作者具有精熟的技法和整体把握作品布局的能力。在创作时,要注意正文与落款的主次关系,要使它们之间主次有别,相应生辉。落款切忌暄宾夺主。落款可写在末行正文的下方,布局时应留出余地。款的底端一般不以正文平齐,以避免形式的死板。也可在正文后面另占一行或数行,上下均不宜与正文平齐。印章要小于款字,盖印一般需离开一字以上位置,盖在款字的下方,也可盖在款字左侧。 ⒌条幅 条幅是竖行书写的长条作品。尺寸一般为一张整宣纸对裁。安排章法时,应能根据书体的特点,精心构思,立意要新。在创作时,要注意正文与落款的主次关系,。落款要错落有致,自然生动。落款可写在末行正文的下方,布局时应留出余地。款的底端一般不以正文平齐,以避免形式的死板。也可在正文后面另占一行或两行,上下均不宜与正文平齐。印章要小于款字,盖印一般需离开一字以上位置,也可盖在款字左侧。 条幅常见的格式有两种: ①写成两行或三行的。两行的格式。左右两行均靠纸的左右两边写,中间留出较多空白。注意上下字的 联系节奏,以及两行间的彼此呼应。落款通常写在第二行的末尾,位置应略高于第一行末一个字。款字 可写一行或两行。三行的格式,需注意三行之间的相互关系,穿插映带及节奏变化。落款可在末行下 端,底端略高于一、二两行正文的位置；也可另行写款,款字应短于正文,上下不宜与正文平行。 ②居中写一行(少字数)的。书写内容一般为格言、警句或一句诗词等。字数较少,写时要注意字的开 合及节奏变化,以求生动。落款可分单款、双款。单款一般写在左侧中间的位置。款字内容包括书写时 间、作者的名号,也可只写作者名或号。印章盖在款字下方,一般以两方为宜,印与印之间要适当拉开 距离。落双款,上款写在作品的右侧中间偏上的部分,一般写创作作品的时间,若是赠送作品,则需写 明被赠者的名或号,称谓及雅正、惠存,清赏等字样。 ⒍对联 对联,又称楹联。分为上下两联,右边的为上联,左边的为下联。上下联的尺寸可与条幅等同,也可大于或小于条幅。对联的书写内容规定极为严格,只能是对仗的句子(上下联字数相等,平仄相对、一般字不重复出现),包括对偶句(俗称对子)、律诗中的中间两联(颔联、颈联)。对偶句常见的有五言、七言,也有少到三字一联,多到数十字、上百字一联的。律诗则分为五言、七言两种。五言、七言的对联,在安排章法时,上下联应单行居中竖写。十字以上的对偶句,则宜写成双行或多行(注意书写顺序,上联从右向左,下联则从左向右。落双款,分别于上下联的未尾,款字略高于正文底端)。上下联字的位置一般要基本平行。处理好一联内上下字的大小、收放的变化,及上下两联间的呼应,令上下两联成为一个整体。 十字以下对联的落款分为上下款和单款两种。上下款,上款写在上联右边,下款写在下联左边。上款一般写诗句的作者、篇名等内容,如"黄庭坚登快阁诗句"下款则写书者的姓名、号,以及书写地点、时间等内容。如"丙子闲堂书于北京"若是赠送作品,上联需写明被赠者的名或号、称谓及雅正、惠存、清赏等字样。如"文英女士惠存"若是别人请你写的一幅作品,上联则写请你作书人的名或号,称谓外加上"嘱书"等字样。单款一般写在下联左侧中间偏上的位置。款字内容包括书写时间、作者的名号,也可只写作者名或号。印章盖在款字下方,一般以两方为宜,印与印之间要适当拉开距离。 ⒎扇面 这里专指折扇扇面,它是一种特殊的形式。由于扇面上宽下窄的形状,使得折纹与拆纹之间也是上宽下窄。这种独特的样式,就要求我们在创作时,做出恰当地安排。 扇面常见的形式有三种 (1)充分利用上端,下端不用。这种格式以每行写两字为宜,从右至左,依次安排。落款写在正文的左侧。款宜长些,款字写一行至数行不等,印章宜小于正文。 (2)写少数字,利用扇面的宽度由右向左,横排书写二至四字,要收放有度,落款可写数行小字,与正文相映成趣。 (3)上端依次书写,下端隔行书写,形成长短错落的格局。这样则可避免上端疏朗,而下端拥挤的情形,达到通篇的和谐。这种格式,先写长行,以五字左右为宜,短行以一、二字为宜。落款要精彩,一般写在正文后面,一行或数行均可。即章宜小于落款的字。 书法传统创作 样式的落款与钤印 落款源于"款识"。原本是青铜器上的铭文对浇铸这一器皿原由的说明。后延用为对书画作品作者及内容的说明。落款内容为作者姓名(包括字、号)、时间、书写内容甚至包括书写地点、环境或气候、心情等。落款有上款、下款之分。作者姓名称为下款。书作赠送对象称为上款。上款一般不写姓只写名字,以示亲切,如果是单名,姓名同写。在姓名下还要写上称谓,一般称"同志"、"先生",再下面写"正之"、"正书"、"指正"或"嘱书"、"嘱正"、"雅正"、"惠存"等。上款可写在书作右上方或正文结束以后,但上款必须在下款的上方,以示尊敬。一般不与正文齐平,可略下些,字比正文小些。 在创作之前,首先要选择所书写的内容,内容要求健康、积极向上,也可写古代或当代诗词或名句。内容确定后可考虑书写形式,是写中堂、对联、横幅、条幅还是册页、斗方；是写大字还是小字,写几行,纸多大？还要留下落款的位置。正文内容不可齐边顶头书写,四周要留有空白。中堂、对联、条幅这些竖式书作上下留白(称天头、地头)要大于两侧。一股上空又大于下空。譬如写条幅,天头留白十厘米,地头可留白七厘米,两侧可各留白三五厘米。横幅留空左右相当,但要大于天地,天地留白均等。斗方、册页留白四周大致相同。四边留白确定后,根据字数多少及纸的大小折行或叠格子。 创作时,大字写完了换小笔写落款,落款竖写,可写两行,也可一行只写作者姓名(称穷款)。根据留空多寡落款,可写内容出处,还可写年代,最后写姓名,"某某人书"。一般落款字小于正文的字,书体可于正文相同或带行意的楷书以示区别。最后盖章。 钤印,指盖印章。印章分朱文印和白文印两种。朱文印又称阳文,即字是凸出的,印在纸上字是红色的；白文印又称阴文,即字是凹陷的,印在纸上字是白色的。从印章的内容来分,又有姓名印、斋号印及闲章。一般在落款人名后盖一姓名印,若嫌空还可再加盖一斋号印,不可连盖两方同一内容的姓名印。可盖一方姓印,一方名印,而往往又是一朱一白。为了使书作上下前后呼应,往往在书作右上方再盖一起首印,又称引首印,初学者闲章印的内容可选"学海"、"求索"、"学书"等。印章的大小与书作大小及所书字体大小相关。一般大幅书作落款字大,印亦大,小幅书作落款字小,印亦小。 用印的忌讳 书画上落款盖印,印比字大不可以。大幅盖大印,小幅盖小印,理所当然。 国画直幅落款字下盖印,直下底角,不可再盖压角闲章。如右上落款,左下角可盖闲章,左上落款,右下角可盖闲章。如上款字印接近下角,闲章就不需盖了。 国画棋幅落款,左右两头角边,不可盖闲章。右上落款,左下角可盖方形闲章,左下落款,右下角可盖方形闲章。此处如不需要盖闲章,而勉强盖上,反而弄巧成拙。 长方形,圆形,长圆形闲章,尔不可盖在下角方形压角闲章处之地位。 方形闲章,不可盖在书画上端空白处,就喧宾夺主了。 国画直幅落款,字行末行末字,与他行字长短,不可整齐,盖印亦如此。 盖二印,一方形,一圆形,不可匹配。同形印可匹配。 盖二印,一大一小,匚可匹配。同样大小可匹配。 盖二印,一长方形,一椭圆形,不可匹配。同形印可匹配。 盖二印,上阳文,下阴文,不可匹配,。而上阴下阳可匹配。 盖二印,上阳文,下阳文,不可匹配。而上阴下阳可匹配。 盖二印,上阴文,下阴文,不可匹配。而上阴下阳可匹配。 落款盖印之下,不可再题字,。印章上下有字掣肘,就失去自然现象。 已经落款盖印字画,款后不可再落上款赠人,就失敬了。 花头,鸟尾,树枝,山顶上,不可落款盖印。这是画家最起码的常识,不可不懂。 匠刻印章,不可用於书画上,需用艺术篆刻家,所刻石章最佳。 普通印,不适用於书画上,要用八宝印泥。 盖二印,距离不可太远太近,相隔一个印距离正好。 盖二印,印文,章法,刀法各异,不可匹配。要用相同刀法所刻印章。 画上不可题打油诗,一来识者奚,落二来作品就贬为低俗。 上款上端不可盖闲章,压在人名头上,人家很忌讳。一来失礼,二来破坏了画面。 盖压角闲章,不可太小,宣纸四开,用方形石印,大约叁公分,比较适中。 盖压角闲章,不可盖二方上,一方正好。印与边距离约一。五公分为适中。 落款字下不盖印,而偏要盖在款字左右,脱离字行,而成画外物,特殊情形例外。 书画上,不可盖上劈头大印,即成巨印炸弹,毁灭了美丽的画面,令人看了很恐怖。 小画不可题大字,大画不可题小字。小空不可题字多,大空不可题字少。 书画上姓名印,不可连盖叁印以上,应盖二印,或一印妥当。 书画上下左右,不可任意盖印。盖多不当,不如少盖,印章印泥不佳,倒不如不盖好。 盖二印,不可东倒西歪,如何盖法,用力轻重,印章印泥保养,一切要潜心研究,是不可忽视的问题。 画上不可题上粗俗字题,致影响画面美感,就未能免俗了。 书法四联首幅,右上可盖印首小长形章,其馀不可盖,如统统盖上,行气就破坏了。 常用落款用词 一、称谓 ⒈长辈:吾师、道长、学长、先生、女士(小姐)； ⒉平辈(或小一辈):兄、弟、仁兄、尊兄、大兄、贤兄(弟)、学兄(弟)、道兄、道友、学友、方家、先生、小姐、法家(对书画或某一方面有专长之称)； ⒊关系较亲密:学(仁)弟、吾兄(弟)； ⒋老师对学生:学(仁)弟、学(仁)棣、贤契、贤弟； ⒌同学:学长、学兄、同窗、同砚、同席。 二、上款客套语或敬词 雅赏、雅正、雅评、雅鉴、雅教、雅存、珍存、惠存、清鉴、清览、清品、清属、清赏、清正、清及、清教、清玩、鉴正、敲正、惠正、赐正、斧正、法正、法鉴、博鉴、尊鉴、肠鉴、法教、博教、大教、大雅、补壁、糊壁、是正、教正、讲正、察正、请正、两正、就正、即正、指正、鉴之、正之、哂正、笑正、教之、正腕、正举、存念、属粲、一粲、粲正、一笑、笑笑、笑存、笑鉴、属、鉴、玩 三、下款客套语或敬词 ⒈书法题款用:敬书、拜书、谨书、顿首、嘱书、醉书、醉笔、漫笔、戏书、节临、书、录、题、笔、写、临、篆； ⒉绘画题款用:敬、敬赠、特赠、画祝、写祝、写奉、顿首、题、并题、戏题、题识、题句、敬识、记、题记、谨记、并题、跋、题跋、拜观、录、并录、赞、自赞、题赞、自嘲、手笔、随笔、戏墨、漫涂、率题、画、写、谨写、敬写、仿； ⒊篆刻边款用:刻作、记、制、治石、篆刻。 四、书法作品落款时间的农历传统雅称摘要 十一月:正冬、仲冬、中冬、畅月、霜月、霜见月、子月、辜月、葭月、纸月、复月、天正月、一阳月、广寒月、龙潜月、雪月、寒月、黄钟、阳复、阳祭、冰壮、三至、亚岁、中寒 十二月:丑月、腊月、除月、严月、冰月、余月、极月、涂月、地正月、二阳月、嘉平月、三冬月、梅初月、春待月、季冬、暮冬、晚冬、杪冬、穷冬、黄冬、腊冬、残冬、末冬、严冬、师走、大吕、星回节、殷正、清祀、冬素 书画作品盖章的学问 画上落款盖印,印比字大不可以。大幅盖大印,小幅盖小印,理所当然。 国画直幅落款字下盖印,直下底角,不可再盖压角闲章。如右上落款,左下角可盖闲章,左上落款,右下角可盖闲章。如上款字印接近下角,闲章就不需盖了。 国画棋幅落款,左右两头角边,不可盖闲章。右上落款,左下角可盖方形闲章,左下落款,右下角可盖方形闲章。此处如不需要盖闲章,而勉强盖上,反而弄巧成拙。 长方形,圆形,长圆形闲章,尔不可盖在下角方形压角闲章处之地位。 方形闲章,不可盖在书画上端空白处,否则,就喧宾夺主了。 国画直幅落款,字行末行末字,与他行字长短,不可整齐,盖印亦如此。 盖二印,一方形,一圆形,不可匹配。同形印可匹配。 盖二印,一大一小,不可匹配。同样大小可匹配。 盖二印,一长方形,一椭圆形,不可匹配。同形印可匹配。 落款盖印之下,不可再题字,。印章上下有字掣肘,就失去自然现象。 已经落款盖印字画,款后不可再落上款赠人,否则,就失敬了。 花头,鸟尾,树枝,山顶上,不可落款盖印。这是画家最起码的常识,不可不懂。 匠刻印章,不可用於书画上,需用艺术篆刻家,所刻石章最佳。 普通印泥,不适用于书画上,要用八宝印泥。 盖二印,距离不可太远太近,相隔一个印距离正好。 盖二印,印文,章法,刀法各异,不可匹配。要用相同刀法所刻印章。 画上不可题打油诗,一来识者奚落,二来作品就贬为低俗。 上款上端不可盖闲章,压在人名头上,人家很忌讳。一来失礼,二来破坏了画面。 盖压角闲章,不可太小,宣纸四开,用方形石印,大约叁公分,比较适中。 盖压角闲章,不可盖二方上,一方正好。印与边距离约一。五公分为适中。 落款字下不盖印,而偏要盖在款字左右,脱离字行,而成画外物,特殊情形例外。 书画上,不可盖上劈头大印,即成巨印炸弹,毁灭了美丽的画面,令人看了很恐怖。 小画不可题大字,大画不可题小字。小空不可题字多,大空不可题字少。 书画上姓名印,不可连盖叁印以上,应盖二印,或一印妥当。 书画上下左右,不可任意盖印。盖多不当,不如少盖,印章印泥不佳,倒不如不盖好。 用印宁少勿多,宁单勿双,印泥的使用宁古勿媚,主张用仿古色,次之朱砂,最次大红,这样会提高作品的格调。 盖二印,不可东倒西歪,如何盖法,用力轻重,印章印泥保养,一切要潜心研究,是不可忽视的问题。 画上不可题上粗俗字题,致影响画面美感,就未能免俗了。 书法四联首幅,右上可盖印首小长形章,其馀不可盖,如统统盖上,行气就破坏了。 一点书画小知识,也是一些书画家的问题整理出来供大家签鉴正。

中国书法的条幅作品中,留白的位置与大小有何规定?', 'role': 'user'}]
